Lincoln.Nebraska Coliseum: The Nebraska Coliseum (also called the NU Coliseum or The Coliseum) is an indoor coliseum on the campus of the University of Nebraska-Lincoln. It was the home of Nebraska's basketball team from 1926 to 1976 and volleyball team from 1975 to 2013. It currently hosts Nebraska wrestling on occasion, and is used primarily as a student recreation center.
